it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class ActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler

  • public class ActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    class which is responsable of the handling of all the action performed by the clients. Is used by the Game object to perform the actions, after an ASKACT message has been received. the action which must be handled are of 5 different types:
    • handleTower(Player, Action): handle all the action performed on tower regions
    • handleCouncil(Player, Action): handle all the action performed on the council region
    • handleHarvest(Player, Action): handle all the action performed on the harvest region
    • handleProduction(Player, Action): handle all the action performed on the production regions
    • handleMarket(Player, Action): handle all the action performed on the market region
    • handleActionEffect(Player, Action, Effect, JsonValue): handle all the action which has been triggered by an ACTION effect of one card
    attributes of ActionHandler class
    • board: the board of the game
    • game: the Game object needed from ActionHandler to perform actions
    • contextManager: context manager is used to open context and handle their responses
    See Also:
    Game, ContextManager, Board, TowerRegion, Player, Action, DevelopmentCard, Effect, ResourceSet, MessageManager, ServerMessageFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleActionEffect(Player player, Action action, Effect effect, com.eclipsesource.json.JsonValue jEffect)
      method used to handle ACTION effect action, i.e. action triggered by the activation of an effect which allow to make another action without placing a family member.
      void handleCouncil(Player player, Action action)
      method used to handle COUNCIL action. this method open a context on the client screen to allow the player to choose what resources he want gain from his council privilege. after the response has been received the method finally apply the change
      void handleHarvest(Player player, Action action)
      method used to handle HARVEST action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of TERRITORY cards owned by the player.
      void handleMarket(Player player, Action action)
      method used to handle MARKET action. if the action has been performed on the action space with ID 3 of the market region, a context is open on the client screen to allow the player choose the resources he wants gain from his two council privilges
      void handleProduction(Player player, Action action)
      method used to handle PRODUCTION action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of BUILDING cards owned by the player.
      void handleTower(Player player, Action action)
      method used to handle TOWER action. this method take the card from the board, add the permanent effect of CHARACHTER cards to the player list of effects and then apply the instant effect of the card taken, if the card has an ACTION effect handleActionEffect() is called

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • handleTower

        public void handleTower(Player player,
                        Action action)
        method used to handle TOWER action. this method take the card from the board, add the permanent effect of CHARACHTER cards to the player list of effects and then apply the instant effect of the card taken, if the card has an ACTION effect handleActionEffect() is called
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player

      • handleProduction

        public void handleProduction(Player player,
                             Action action)
        method used to handle PRODUCTION action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of BUILDING cards owned by the player. If there are cards which have a CHANGE effect as permanent effect a context is opened on the client screen and after the response has been received the changes are performed
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player

      • handleHarvest

        public void handleHarvest(Player player,
                          Action action)
        method used to handle HARVEST action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of TERRITORY cards owned by the player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player

      • handleCouncil

        public void handleCouncil(Player player,
                          Action action)
        method used to handle COUNCIL action. this method open a context on the client screen to allow the player to choose what resources he want gain from his council privilege. after the response has been received the method finally apply the change
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player

      • handleMarket

        public void handleMarket(Player player,
                         Action action)
        method used to handle MARKET action. if the action has been performed on the action space with ID 3 of the market region, a context is open on the client screen to allow the player choose the resources he wants gain from his two council privilges
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player

      • handleActionEffect

        public void handleActionEffect(Player player,
                               Action action,
                               Effect effect,
                               com.eclipsesource.json.JsonValue jEffect)
        method used to handle ACTION effect action, i.e. action triggered by the activation of an effect which allow to make another action without placing a family member. handleActionEffect() open an ActionEffectContext on the client screen and, as long as the response represent a non valid action the server continue to open context to allow the client to perform his bonus action. the action can be annulled if the player can't perform any action or he doesn't want to perform it.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who has maden the action
        action - the action maden by the player
        effect - the effect which has triggered the bonus action
        effectAction - a JsonValue used to handle the context response
